TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Size3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

Docs.summary: Data structure that describes the size of a three-dimensional object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types. ## XAML Text Usage ## Examples This example shows how to determine if two structures are equal using the static method. The following code illustrates how to check structures for equality. The structures are declared and assigned values. The method is then used to determine if the two structures are equal. [!code-csharp[3DGallery_procedural_snip#Size3DEqualityExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/Misc3DOperationsExample.cs#size3dequalityexample_csharp)]

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float64 x, float64 y, float64 z) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A> values must be non-negative.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that represents an empty structure.
Docs.value: An empty instance of a structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure with <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A> values set to 0 is not empty. An empty <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure has <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D.Z%2A> values set to negative infinity. This is the only time a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure can have negative values.
## Examples The following example shows how to make a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Size3D> structure empty.
[!code-csharp[size3dsample#Mil3dSize3DN10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Size3DSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mil3dsize3dn10)] [!code-vb[size3dsample#Mil3dSize3DN10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Size3DSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mil3dsize3dn10)]
